content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia using Markdown

function extract_julia_code(md::AbstractString)
    parsed = mdparse(md)
    nodes = []
    pushfirst!(nodes, parsed.document)
    extracted_code = ""

    function visit_codeblock(node::CodeBlock)
        push!(nodes, node.next)
        code = join(node.content, "\n")
        push!(extracted_code, code)
    end

    function visit_node(node::AbstractNode)
        if node isa CodeBlock
            visit_codeblock(node)
        else
            for child in node.content
                visit_node(child)
            end
        end
    end

    for node in nodes
        visit_node(node)
    end

    popfirst!(nodes) # remove the initial document node

    return extracted_code
end
```
